item.description:
Our Ethic Dining Series resumes.....

A Culinary journey down Silk Road at Chaloos restaurant. The best Persian House of Kabobs located in the town of Easton Massachusetts. FYI: This is an establishment with no liquor liscence, but you are encouraged to bring your own beer or wine if you so choose. I wanted to give fair warning on this so you come prepared.

  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Chaloos Restaurant
574 Washington St
South Easton, MA 02375

(508) 230-1888

Website: http://www.chaloosrestaurant.com/

Organizer: Alison

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Alison.

Price Range: Appetizers starting at $3.95, Soups, Salads, Pizza and Wraps ranging from $4.95 - $9.95 and entrees ranging from $10.95 - $23.95 (something for all budgets).

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00

2012 Annual Membership Special: Join as an Annual Member for 2012 before the end of 2011 and save! Through the end of this year, 2012 Annual Memberships are $6.00 for Current and Past Annual Members and $8.00 for all other Group Members.

Cash Only Policy:Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Monday, December 12th @ 7:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

Inclement Weather:We will dine regardless of the weather.  However, if there is extreme weather forecasted check back here starting 48 hours prior to the event for updates.  (Please see our "Weather" policy on the about Pages for more detailed information.)

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions: Chaloos is located on Washington Street (route 138) in South Easton, MA easily accessible from route 24 (exit 17B) and 123. For a link to directions see the Chaloos website: http://www.chaloosrestaurant.com/map.php
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Alison' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Next stop Persia..........
